translated: Completed writing at Bodhi Monastery on the 10th day of the 5th month in the 1st year of KÅhÅ (851), the 22nd day of the 8th month, at the East Window of the Kannon Chiin, I have finally collated the old edition of the JikÅin of Toji. It is my wish that the Buddha Dharma may flourish and be fulfilled. Monk JÅken, 58 years old in the secular world
